short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sunhat Extension helps you fill out sustainability questionnaires and forms using your company's data from the Sunhat platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sunhat is your central workbench for managing sustainability-related requests. Stop spending hours with manual operational tasks and spreadsheets - focus your valuable time on activities that drive impact.

The Sunhat Extension for Chrome helps you fill out sustainability questionnaires and forms using your company's data from the Sunhat platform.
- Copy & paste texts, documents and links
- Jump into your answer library by typing Sunhat in the address bar

To learn more about Sunhat, please visit https://www.getsunhat.com
